content: available free here https //lisasattik wordpress com/2019/12/25/thyme-after-thyme/ purchased copy includes english swedish german and dutch a beautiful asymmetric triangle shawl which is worked side to side it incorporates simple sampler style patterns which gives a stunning end result and the mix of textured lace panels and simple eyelets will keep your interest as you re crocheting the sample is made in 4ply yarn but you can experiment with this pattern using different yarn weights and hook sizes and maybe stripes of colour to really make this piece your own the pattern includes full written instructions with a stitch count at the end of each row as well as some hand drawn charts i hope you enjoy making gifting and wearing my design thyme after thyme xx
